definition: to find the time to do sth
to draw out/to pull out from in between/to remove part of the whole/(of certain plants) to sprout or bud/to whip or thrash

sentences.english: Recently I put my photos in order and will post them here one by one.
sentences.chinese: 最近抽空整理了一些相片，会将它们陆续传上来。

sentences.english: Let the kids watch TV for an hour and go read a book.
sentences.chinese: 让孩子们单独看一小时电视，你可以抽空看会儿书。

sentences.english: Take the liberty to write you this letter of recommendation, please your taking the time to look at.
sentences.chinese: 冒昧给您写这封建议书，请您在百忙中抽空看一看。

sentences.english: The meeting would take place on the sidelines of the U.N. General Assembly in New York.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议将在纽约联大会议期间抽空举行。

sentences.english: Nurses often have to split their time at different schools.
sentences.chinese: 通常护士必须抽空去不同的学校。

sentences.english: Maybe I will watch that TV show sometime.
sentences.chinese: 说不定我还真会抽空看看那部电视剧。

sentences.english: Even I often find time to read books on the art of war and gain much benefit from them.
sentences.chinese: 我常常抽空阅读兵书，从中得到了不少好处。

sentences.english: All the water tanks & fuel oil tanks should be filled or empty in order to reduce the free liquid surface.
sentences.chinese: 各水舱及燃油舱应尽可能注满或抽空，减少自由液面。

sentences.english: So you will read that on your own.
He took one look at the great fish as he watched the shark close in.
sentences.chinese: 他注视着鲨鱼在逼近，抽空朝那条大鱼望上一眼。

sentences.english: I had time off to get few computer courses in order to strengthen and enrich my skills.
sentences.chinese: 为了充实本人，增进技能，我抽空修了几门计算机课。

sentences.english: But before I can even get round to it, I'm plagued with doubts.
sentences.chinese: 然而在我抽空做这些之前，我又被各种疑虑折磨上了。

sentences.english: First appreciate you in white busy in find time to read my material.
sentences.chinese: 首先感谢你在白忙之中抽空阅读我的材料。

sentences.english: so it's nice just to be able to relax and not have to do work.
sentences.chinese: 所以能抽空放松一下感觉非常不错。
我会抽空去参观世博机械人展览。

sentences.english: Afternoon, I take the opportunity to the supermarket and bought black paint brush and small tubes.
sentences.chinese: 下午，我抽空到超市买了刷子和小管黑颜料。

definition: to (try to) find the time to
to snatch time/to rush/to hurry (up)/to seize the moment
(do sth) in passing/incidentally (while doing sth else)
